heading.who: David Mark Seidel Weddings - Wedding Officiants, Planners, Venues

about.heading: About David Mark Seidel
paras: David Mark Seidel is an ordained minister and full-time wedding officiant/wedding planner/and owner-operator of a full service Wedding Garden Venue in Charlotte's Southpark.  His team of professionals perform weddings nationally and internationally.

David is a practitioner of World Faiths, among them: Christian, Jewish, Hindu, and Native American. He spent 10 years of dedicated scriptural study in monastic settings both in New York and India. His successful married life is 46 years strong and that was preceded by a 10 year blossoming friendship to his wife Jeanette.   He is the proud father of the handsomest young man in the Carolinas, son Jonathan.

When you meet him, you will see and feel what he is all about and you will be very pleased you chose him to make your marriage a sacred and everlasting relationship.  Allow David to create a ceremony and an event that launches your marriage with exquisite positive energy, a day that will "love you back to life again and again".

services.heading: Wedding Services
services.subHeading: David Mark Seidel has a package to fit every couple’s needs and budget. He will customize one just for you that is perfect for your celebration.  He will also serve your wedding as a Planner and provide beautiful vocals for the ceremony and reception.

data.heading: SOUTHPARK GARDEN WEDDING, the most popular Micro Wedding Package...A typical package includes deluxe floral arch, bridal bouquet, custom wedding cake and dedicated photo coverage of the ceremony, the couple and their intimate gathering.
data.description: Our Micro Wedding Package is the most popular of our packages. These ceremonies are perfect for couples hosting from 10 - 50 guests and depending on the size we accommodate them in the Garden setting (up to 10 guests) or at our spacious private Clubhouse on the Greenway (up to 50 guests), also in Southpark.
points: David and his Wedding Company will travel throughout the Carolinas and beyond to serve you.  All services can be performed anywhere within Mecklenburg County – outside of county will incur a travel fee.

data.heading: Each and Every Ceremony is Unique
points: Ceremony, wedding vows, and custom script development for the big day
As much phone and e-mail communication and personal consultation as needed
Pre-marital counseling is available to all couples with at least one session being the recommended minimum commitment
Vocal music can be sung by David if requested
Rehearsals are optional and highly recommended
Optional professional music coordination for the ceremony with our in-house audio technician.

data.heading: Couples' Support
points: Typically 4 counseling sessions that focus on building inspiring relationship skills:  communication of feelings, good listening, self-inquiry, intimacy, and humor.  At least one session being the recommended minimum commitment.

data.heading: Wedding Planner
points: David provides vendor selection and management of:
Venue, Caterer, DJ, Musicians, Vocalist, Photographer, Videographer, Rentals, Cake, Floral, Décor, Dress, Transportation, Lodging, Hair&Make-up

data.heading: Vocalist
points:
As a Vocalist, David approaches the marriage ceremony and reception as a wondrous vessel infused with joy and celebration and offers love songs from the Best of Broadway and The Great American Songbook.
His Songlist includes the inspiration of  Frank Sinatra, John Legend, The Beatles, Stevie Wonder, Miles Davis, Cole Porter, Rodgers & Hart, Bill Withers, James Taylor, Antonio Carlos Jobim and many more Greats!

text: Reverend David was awesome! We were searching for an officiant a few weeks before the wedding as the officiant we had lined up fell through. We’re so thankful we found Reverend David. He was transparent, easy to work with, and very professional. It was more than just a service he provided but he wanted to get to know not only my fiancé and I but our families and friends as well. He did an amazing job at our ceremony and it really couldn’t have been more perfect. So much so that my mother in law is using him to officiate her upcoming wedding. :) Thanks so much, Reverend David!!

We met with him and he was so amazing! He heard our story agreed to married us and made it a truly unforgettable experience. He gave us guidance and was great to work with. He is a great man of God and officiant. I recommend him for anyone looking to have a great marriage experience.

I am a professional musician who for the past 7 years have played for weddings almost every weekend. I have experienced a variety of officiants and Reverend David Mark Seidel stood out to me. He was so sweet and uplifting. His approach was unique and creative. I am planning my own wedding in September of 2018 and am planning on using his services so that I can also have such a warm, intimate atmosphere at my wedding.

I struggle to find words depicting how perfect our ceremony, and just day in general, was. Everything came together as it should, and I believe it to be so because of Reverend Seidel’s leading role. His graciousness, leadership, positive attitude, and loving aura, smoothed the day over like a polished stone. Everyone went out of their way to compliment him, and they weren’t even aware of the phenomenal person he was behind the scenes. He is now my friend. He is now my family. I can not thank him enough. That being said, I highly recommend having him benefit any services he offers that you are in need of. Again to Reverend Seidel… Thank you. Thank you, thank you.

Our day couldn’t have been made without Reverend David marrying us! He was extremely warming and you felt as if he truly cared about your wedding and marriage. He was extremely professional, helpful, and encouraging through all the wedding planning. We highly recommend anyone seeking to get married to book Rev. David!

I have worked directly with David for a long time, he is very dedicated and takes great pride in the job he does. He puts the bride and groom first and will ALWAYS make your special day that much more wonderful. Don't waste time looking for other Wedding Officiants, book him if you can, he is a busy man that really cares and is very talented!!!
I had the opportunity to meet and experience a great and personal ceremony when Reverend David Seidel married my son and daughter in law. He had a special touch and it was just the best!

Rev. Seidel was a wonderful officiant to work with. He did an excellent job of preparing us for our wedding day and listening to our goals for our service and ceremony. His personality and demeanor were truly a delight!!

I was very involved in the planning of my brothers wedding and was having trouble finding an officiant who could conduct the ceremony in Spanish (as brides family would be streaming from overseas). Reverend David Mark Seidel conducted a beautiful ceremony in all spanish and made it feel very personal with moments of laughter as well as moments with tears. Received so many positive comments after ceremony. Could not be happier with the way it all turned out.

Reverend David assisted us with a beautiful wedding ceremony. Not only did he have heart warming speech but also performed it in Spanish for us, family and, friends. Reverend David was kind and explained every step to us. He was very reliable and professional and would definitely recommend him if you are planning to get married. Thank you so much Reverend David!!!!

David's remarkable uplifting personality and attitude towards a loving ceremony made it all the more. He was extremely sensitive to the newlyweds needs and emotions they were feeling. I would encourage everyone thinking about marriage to sit down and chat with David and you'll see that he will be the perfect person to officiate. Thank you David for making a beautiful ceremony happen with such grace and ease.

If a white hat is the sign of a man with a big heart for sharing the truth about love then David Mark Seidel is the best officiant reverend I have experienced in some time. David intentionally honored the precious souls in the family that contributed to the BIG story of the wedding couple. He did it with humility while gracefully prompting others in the family to speak about their relationship with the couple. The ceremony flowed with emotion as I felt led to understand what marriage for Kyle and Bri would mean for them. Kudos to a a very polished man of God!

Weddings are a time of unity, laughter and happily ever after. Reverend David Seidel helped our family to accomplish all those things. His loving, yet professional, demeanor struck just the right note. His sense of humor and understanding heart helped us create a day we will remember always.
As the song goes, 'Love isn't Love until you give it away.' I am sure that everyone at the wedding loved a bit more deeply as he guided us all through this song and message. Thank You!

Rev. David was Amazing. He made our ceremony a family event. He involved our kids in every aspect. He spoke the words that my husband and I have been wanting to say to each other we just didn’t know how.

The most important and wonderful thing he did for us was, He Sang a very special song for Mike and I. Our family couldn’t have asked for a better day. Rev. David is the reason. We wish him happiness, good health, but most of all Love and Laughter for the New Year.
Great experience. One of a kind character. Made my daughter's wedding a unique occasion. Great personality, very likable fellow.

Reverend David was an all around AMAZING minister, leader and witness in the Wright’s wedding ceremony. I served as a Professional Videographer for this wedding and what stood out to me the most was Reverend David’s ability to connect with the essence of his peers.
He was sharp, on time, and even stayed after the ceremony to connect with everyone who was gracefully involved.
Highly recommend this professional here! There isn’t any other minister you’d need.

D would love to share my appreciation for Rev.D.Seidel. The marriage sermon for my brother and his new wife was professional but yet the Spirit of God was present. He was serious but there was times when he made us all laugh, this was my first time meeting him and if i ever get blessed to get married if i can not have Rev. David Seidel I sure pray that it is someone like him. God Bless you Reverend Seidel.

David was so responsive and flexible and only ever cared about making sure the moment my wife and I shared was as special and memorable as possible. Just be upfront with him and he will deliver ten fold. He is the most sincere and honest person you will ever meet!

He was everything you want a wedding officiant to be!. Reverend David performed my nephew's wedding in a very professional and friendly manner. I like the fact that he likes to come an hour before the ceremony to talk to the groom and the bride and meet the family members. It was a very nice and sweet ceremony. Thank you Reverend David.
My son and daughter-in-law chose the right man for the job. Very professional but also lots of fun. I wish him the best!

Reverend David did a great job on our wedding with short short notice. He made it to the ceremony with plenty of time and was able to check out the ceremony set up to see the layout of where he would be standing and how we would be coming in; he even was a little involved in the decision making process. He gave a beautiful bilingual ceremony that everyone enjoyed, so I would easily recommend him for anyone interested in a bilingual ceremony.

paras: For more than 40 years, David and his team have been performing ceremonies all over the world.

Our beautiful and intimate wedding garden in Charlotte's Southpark is the number one choice for micro weddings at this time. A typical package includes customized ceremony, deluxe floral arch, bridal bouquet, artisan wedding cake and dedicated photo coverage of the ceremony, the couple and their intimate gathering. David Mark Seidel Weddings have been featured on Live with Kelly and Ryan, ABC NEWS, WBTV and all major news outlets.  David Mark Seidel is a one-of-a-kind original. No one else inside the wedding industry is able to bring the level of intimacy and trust to a ceremony like he does. His trademark is to invite family and friends to stand and bestow blessings on the couple just before they say their " I dos ".   A wedding with David and company is a gathering fully engaged in the ritual of celebration, not merely spectators at a distance.

We currently officiate denominational and non-denominational weddings in the United States and abroad.  Our couples enjoy pre-marital coaching sessions that focus on building inspiring relationship skills:  communication of feelings, good listening, self-inquiry, intimacy, and  humor.

We are expert Wedding Planners, providing Vendor selection and management of: Venue, Caterer, DJ, Musicians, Vocalist, Photographer, Videographer, Rentals, Cake, Floral, Décor, Dress, Transportation, and Lodging.  AND...  Our company's dedicated team of professionals includes expert Photographers, Multi-Lingual Officiants, Floral/Decor Designers, Musicians, Hair and Make-up Artists, Artisan Bakers, DJ's, Videographers and selected Venues in the Carolinas.

Interested in pricing? Interested in booking David and his team? You can use our contact page, reach us at 704.526.7284, or david@davidmarkseidel.com for availability.We are multi-lingual Spanish/English/French, Se Habla Espanol and are also skilled in Hindi/Sanskrit for Indian weddings/ Pujas and Hebrew for Jewish weddings. We perform same sex marriages. All prices and programs are subject to change.

faqs.heading: FAQs for your Officiant, Venue & Planning Needs
faqs.headingSub: Welcome to DAVID MARK SEIDEL WEDDINGS! We are here to make your wedding event a truly special and memorable experience. Below are some of our most frequently asked questions to help you get started.

questions.question: What services do you offer?
questions.answer: We offer a range of services to meet your wedding needs, including:
subs: Officiant Services: We are licensed wedding officiants and ordained ministers available for weddings in the Charlotte, Ballantyne, and South Park areas. We perform non-denominational, interfaith, and multi-cultural ceremonies.
Planning & Coordination: We provide various planning services, from full-service wedding planning to "day-of" coordination, to ensure your special day runs smoothly.

Venue: Our beautiful and intimate wedding garden in Charlotte Southpark is the number one choice for micro weddings at this time. A typical package includes customized ceremony, deluxe floral arch, bridal bouquet, artisan wedding cake and dedicated photo coverage of the ceremony, the couple and their intimate gathering.

questions.question: Where are you located?
questions.answer: We serve Charlotte, The Carolinas, and all of the world's geography. We are familiar with many local wedding venues and can provide guidance on finding the perfect spot for your ceremony.

questions.question: Are you licensed wedding officiants?
questions.answer: Yes, we are fully licensed wedding officiants and ordained ministers. We are legally authorized to perform marriage ceremonies in the Carolinas and beyond.

questions.question: Can you help us prepare for married life?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer couples coaching sessions...typically 4 coaching sessions that focus on building inspiring relationship skills: communication of feelings, good listening, self-inquiry, intimacy, and humor. At least one session being the recommended minimum commitment. Our sessions utilize recommended readings and regular homework.

questions.question: Can you help us with our wedding vows?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We specialize in creating a ceremony that is unique to you as a couple. We can provide guidance and resources for writing customized wedding vows, or we can work with you to craft a ceremony that reflects your love story and values.

questions.question: What kind of ceremonies do you perform?
questions.answer:
We are experienced in a wide range of ceremonies, including:
• Non-denominational Wedding Ceremony: A ceremony that focuses on your love and commitment without specific religious affiliations.
• Interfaith Wedding Officiant: We are skilled in blending different faiths and traditions to create a meaningful ceremony that honors both partners.
• Fusion & Multi-Cultural Weddings: We embrace and incorporate cultural traditions from around the world. We can officiate ceremonies that include elements from Hindu, Jewish, Christian, Latin American and other cultural traditions.

questions.question: Are you bilingual/multilingual officiants?
questions.answer: Yes, our team includes officiants who are fluent in English, Spanish, Hindi, Hebrew, and French.

questions.question: Can you perform our ceremony in a language other than English?
questions.answer: Yes. We offer multi-lingual wedding ceremonies and can officiate your wedding in English and a language of your preference. We also specialize in intercultural wedding ceremonies that can incorporate multiple languages.

questions.question: Do I need a wedding planner or a "day-of" coordinator?
questions.answer: It depends on your needs! A full-service wedding planner will help you with every detail, from vendor selection to budget management. A "day-of" wedding coordinator is for couples who have done the planning themselves and need a professional to manage the timeline and logistics on the wedding day. We offer both services and can help you determine which option is best for you.

questions.question: How do you work with wedding venues?
questions.answer: We have established relationships with many wedding venues in the Charlotte area, including outdoor wedding venues. We work closely with venue staff to ensure a seamless experience, and we can also assist you in finding the perfect venue for your vision and budget.

questions.question: Do you provide vendor selection and management?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide vendor selection and management of Venue/ Caterer/ DJ/ Musicians/ Vocalist/ Photographer/ Videographer/ Equipment Rentals/ Cake/ Floral/ Décor/ Dress/ Tux/ Transportation/ Lodging/ Hair & Make-up
